Reviews.Title: Great phone - Thanks SHAN3
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPhone. I have to say its the greatest phone I've ever had. I bought it from SHAN3 and it came right away, and it arrived exactly as listed. The phone has a great camera, interface, and a real slick design. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: alis395
Reviews.Content: Phone was delivered quickly, and was like brand new.  Had no problems with swapping service to this phone.  I would buy like this again.

Reviews.Title: Just don't like it.
Reviews.Author: Jenny Higley
Reviews.Content: It just doesn't have the ease of use nor the bells and whistles of a droid.  I'm changing back as soon as I can!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Sebrina Bell
Reviews.Content: I consider the iPhone 4 over the 4s because on the 4s, Siri sometimes like to pop up at random times
